snippet.title: How do cats Purr \- What Makes Cats Work Page 3 - About.com
snippet.description: All domestic cats are born with the purring ability. Kittens instinctively purr when nursing, and your adult cat will purr at the drop of a hat whenever you're near.

snippet.description: Cats Love with Purrs. Her purrs can mean a variety of things, from delight to expressions of concern. And kitty purrs range from soft and subtle to Mack-truck loud.
